CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Roofing__c,'Yes'), IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'Yes'), 'High', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'No'), 'Medium', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'TBD'), 'Low', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'Not Applicable'), 'High', 'Unknown or N/A')))), IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Roofing__c,'No'), IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'Yes'), 'Medium', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'No'), 'Low', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'TBD'), 'Low', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'Not Applicable'), 'Low', 'Unknown or N/A')))), IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Roofing__c,'Not Applicable'), IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'Yes'), 'High', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'No'), 'Low', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'TBD'), 'Unknown or N/A', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'Not Applicable'), 'Unknown or N/A', 'Unknown or N/A')))), IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Roofing__c,'TBD'), IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'Yes'), 'Medium', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'No'), 'Low', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'TBD'), 'Unknown or N/A', IF(ISPICKVAL(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c,'Not Applicable'), 'Unknown or N/A', 'Unknown or N/A')))), 'Unknown or N/A'))))
CustomField.label: Product Awareness Level
